value.product: A digital investment platform for investments in real estate funds
value.application:
* Landingpage with CMS and i18n (<https://fnd.group>)
* SPA with login, identity verification (IDNow) and private key management (<https://invest.fnd.group>)
* Smart Contract for token and token distribution
value.responsibilities:
* Tech department as a service
* Planning of infrastructure
* Planning of security model
* Choice of technologies
* Setup and maintenance of deployment, CI, CD, kanban board, etc.
* Management of requirements (design and product)
* Software development
